attributes.action: Intervene And Ban The Premier League From Playing Games Abroad.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Football is the national game. It is part of the cultural heritage of Britain. The money men who run the Premier League have no right to take the game away from the fans and parade it like a side show around the globe. English Premier League games should be played in England!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
